author: Rhea Mahbubani
title: Nurses are protesting 'grossly inadequate and negligent' PPE and coronavirus testing while filing lawsuits against state officials and hospitals
description:
• Members of National Nurses United will protest outside the White House on Tuesday in a push for adequate personal protective equipment (PPE) as they fight the coronavirus.
  • The country's largest nurses union is urging the president to fund ma…
content:
A lack of personal protective equipment has for weeks crippled medical workers battling the coronavirus, prompting the largest nurses union in the United States to protest outside the White House on Tuesday.
